name: reinvest
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to put money that you receive from an investment back into that investment, or into another investment: reinvest profits/proceeds/income Investors looking to build capital should reinvest the income from the fund. reinvest dividends/capital gainsreinvest sth (back) into sth The owner selling his shares can reinvest the proceeds into other assets.
